title: “Peace, Love and Liberty – Let’s Roll!” (US PEOPLES CONVOY)
cleaned_text:
Publisher’s Note: Big “Shout Out!” to our independent news colleague, filmmaker Ariana Victor, for co-covering with colleague Claire the US PEOPLE’S CONVOY on behalf of Children’s Health Defense TV for the next few weeks. History in the Making, after two years of COVIDtopia. 2022.

Listen to Freedom Convoy Organizer 2022 co-leader Kyle Sefcik’s message for the White House below.

And the Fake News? We’ll keep an eye on the Nonsense…

MS-NBC: Alert! USA People’s Convoy are anti-Ulrainian anti-Fauci Anti-Vaccine Q Anon Trumpers demanding “vague accountability” somewhere outside of Pittsburgh – and oh by the way, don’t think for a Moment that this 40-70 mile convoy of working class rolling small business owners cheered on by tens of thousands of Americans for 8 days now is having ANY effect on ANYthing ANYwhere… 😂
